name: Police Protection
description:
Police Protection is a cartoon police game where you become the law, and do things like arrest people, catch people for speeding, and shoot tires out. You can also earn money, and upgrade your police equipment. This game is in Alpha, and is always getting better. VR support is coming soon!

Installation Instructions:

1. Download a version above.  Once download is complete, open your Downloads folder.  

2. Find the version you downloaded and right click it.

3. Click (Extract All).

4. Then hit Extract.

5. Go into the extracted files, find an executable file (Application File), and left click it twice.

6. Have fun playing Police Protection!
